text: Musa balalena, â€˜ya'o; tomara jibaddasaya tomara jan'ya eta'i ra'ilo ye, tumi balabe, â€˜ami asprsya [1] ebam tomara jan'ya ra'ila eka nirdista samaya, tomara belaya yara byatikrama habe na. Ara tumi tomara se ilahera prati laksya kara yara pujaya tumi rata chile; amara setake jbaliye deba'i, tarapara setake biksipta kare sagare chariye deba'i
